content:
Fistler family

1 Aron FISTLER                       1771-72 - 1841 #85
 + Chai                              1777-81 - 1847 #226 (Eber)
  2o Perla FISTLER                   1811 #127b - Apr 20, 1884 #168
    * Lazar NACHTIGAL                1813 #134 - Dec 16, 1870 #695
          married Dec 29, 1842 #60
        FAMILY LISTING
  2x Wolff Leibel FISTLER            1815-17 - Nov 15, 1888 #447
    + Ester EICHNER                  1818 - 1853 #323
          married Dec 27, 1838 #65
     3o Gitla FISTLER                Jun 14, 1839 #287 - 1849 #593
     3o Doba (Antonina) FISTLER      1842 #435
       * Szymon UNGAR                1837 Gorlice
             married Jul 11, 1878 #30
        4x Jakob UNGAR               Jul 17, 1868 #504 - after 1915
          + Gittel WANK              1870 #323 Rzeszow
                banns 1892 #114,  married Aug 3, 1892 Rzeszow
           5x Leon UNGAR             Jul 9, 1893 #168 Rzeszow
           5o Emilia Mirl UNGAR      1895 #221 Rzeszow
           5o Rozalia UNGAR          1899 #246 Rzeszow

        4x Aron Beer (Albert) UNGAR  Dec 24, 1869 (1870 #12)
          + Cerka LANDY              Apr 20, 1865 (1867 #489)
                married Jul 17, 1894 #111

          * Samuel Beer EIBUSCHITZ   May 1862 Klasno
                married Feb 16, 1892 #21

          + Ester OSIELECKA          Sep 9, 1885 Paris
                married Mar 7, 1911 Paris
        4o Zofia UNGAR               Apr 24, 1878 #219
        4o Amalia UNGAR              Nov 6, 1879 #770 - after 1941
        4x Ignacy UNGAR              Sep 7, 1881 #530
          + Malka Beila BRAND        Mar 11, 1879 #142
                married Sep 7, 1905 Tarnow

        4x Jozef UNGAR               Nov 27, 1885 #716 - after 1940

                banns 1915 #75,  married Apr 15, 1915

     3x son FISTLER                  Nov 1, 1844 #486 - 1844 #250
     3o Susla FISTLER                Feb 22, 1846 #219
       * Jakob Osias LANDESMANN      1841/45 Rzeszow
             married Nov 16, 1885 #102
        4x Mendel LANDESMANN         Aug 25, 1874 #508
        4x Moses Aron LANDESMANN     Nov 18, 1875 #701
          + Rebeka DOBISON           Dobronauti
                banns 1903 #39
        4x Chaim LANDESMANN          Nov 5, 1876 #668 - Jun 10, 1877 #249
        4x Jakob LANDESMANN          Jun 30, 1878 #476 - after 1949
          + Reizel FRIEBER           Oct 18, 1877 #881
                married Aug 23, 1903 #161

             * unknown GLINSKA

        4x unnamed son LANDESMANN    Feb 3, 1890 #47

       * Wolf /Wilhelm FRENKEL       Aug 10, 1856 Pilsk
